name: SFSafariPage
desc: A proxy for a Safari webpage.

items.name: func dispatchMessageToScript(withName: String, userInfo: [String : Any]?)
items.desc: Dispatches a message from the app extension to the content script injected in this page.

items.name: func getPropertiesWithCompletionHandler((SFSafariPageProperties?) -> Void)
items.desc: Retrieves the properties of the webpage.

items.name: func reload()
items.desc: Tells Safari to reload the webpage.
